phase1.title: EMBEDDING GENAI IN YOUR AI TRANSFORMATION PROGRAM
phase1.description: Select between Christelle, Alex, or Jack for the best approach to begin your Generative AI program.

christelle.title: Map the transformative potential of GenAI on our functions and the impact on our workforce
christelle.description: This transformation has to be rooted in sound strategy. We need to identify the functions where GenAI and AI have the most transformative potential to grow our revenues and improve productivity. I would also like to understand what is feasible right now, estimate the associated costs, and get a sense of the overall impact of GenAI and AI on our workforce. From there we can come up with a clear prioritized plan of attack.

alex.title: Partner with a GenAI platform to secure technical foundations
alex.description: We don't have the technology backbone to even consider supporting Generative AI. First things first: we need to build solid technical foundations. I suggest we select a Generative AI platform to handle our future needs. Super AI has the best capabilities on the market to date. They offer us great conditions if we sign an exclusive agreement. We should contract with them now. Else, no chance we will start on the right foot.

jack.title: Democratize GenAI and ask employees to develop their own tools
jack.description: We have no time to waste in this competitive race, Generative AI is so powerful that we should go full speed. I suggest we ask all employees to experiment with Generative AI and build their own tools. Some of my team has started to experiment with public models, and I can already see the benefits. Let's be bold and put GenAI in the hands of our people.
